title: EMERGENCY MEDICINE
description: Our ER department is fully equipped to deal with any contingencies and is supported by ambulance service, dedicated entrance, triage beds and all allied departments ready to support.

title: OBSTETRICS & GYNECOLOGY
description: Women’s Health Providers at Abeer aims at providing state-of-the-art diagnostic evaluation, critical care and education for all women’s health needs. The department is equipped with Doppler Ultrasound, Stereoscopes, Colonoscopies, Laparoscopes and patient monitors

title: ORTHOPAEDICS & SPORTS MEDICINE
description: We believe in giving maximum surgical care and offer a full range of arthroscopic surgeries of the hip, shoulder, knee and elbow. We provide customized treatment programs to guide patients on the safest path to rehabilitation, pain management and recovery.

title: GENERAL & LAPAROSCOPIC
description: The department has skilled consultants capable of performing advanced laparoscopic surgeries, working closely with other concerned specialists to provide timely surgical intervention for complex conditions

title: RADIOLOGY & IMAGING
description: The Radiology & Imaging division here constitutes a team of experts who are committed to provide high quality radio- diagnosis to the patients and referring physicians

title: PEDIATRICS & NEONATOLOGY
description: We offer clinical care tailored to the needs of children and their families. The healing environment with the qualified and experienced team helps in providing the most effective quality care.
